isis.stitle: DT/DTA-466 Diesel Engine Service (1990) - LUBRICATING OIL PUMP, OIL FILTERS AND COOLER - OIL PICKUP TUBE - INSPECTION AND REPAIR

svcproc.title: INSPECTION AND REPAIR
svcproc.para: Check oil pickup tube for cracks leakage:

step1.para:
Remove the oil pan, refer to VIBRATION DAMPER, CRANKSHAFT, MAIN BEARINGS, FLYWHEEL AND CRANKCASE
for the removal procedure.
Verify the oil pickup tube mounting bolt torque using the "Pull-Up-to-the-Mark Method". Refer to "SPECIFICATIONS".

Remove the oil cooler oil drain plug. Refer to Figure 9.30
.

figure.caption: Figure 9.48. Install Oil Pressure Regulator Valve Assembly.

step1.para: Install a 0-350 kPa (0-50 psi) air pressure gauge and air pressure regulator at the oil cooler oil drain location using appropriate fittings.
Seal off the oil pickup tube screen by applying a 102 mm (4 in.) square by 25.4 mm (1 in.) thick foam rubber pad or similar item.
Connect an air supply to the regulator valve.

note.para: Keep the air regulator valve closed when connecting the air supply hose to the regulator.

step1.para: Gradually open the regulator valve and apply 140-205 kPa (20-30 psi) at the air gauge (mounted at the outlet of the air regulator valve) to maintain 20-33 kPa (3 to 5 psi) air pressure in the pipe.

Check the oil pickup tube using a soap solution at the following locations: (Look for bubbles.) (Refer to Figure 9.49
.)

step2.para: Housing w/Inlet Screen - Check seams and brazed connection to tube.
Support Bracket - Check for leaks where the bracket is brazed to the tube.
Mounting Flange Elbow - Check where the pickup tube is brazed to the tube.
Mounting Flange Mating Surface - Check the mounting flange to elbow to front cover mating surfaces.

step1.para: If leakage is found at the tube, housing with inlet screen, support bracket or mounting flange elbow, replace the oil pickup tube assembly.
If leakage is found at mounting flange mating surface, remove assembly and investigate the cause. Check for a damaged or missing gasket or damaged mounting flange mating surface.

note.para:
If the mounting flange mating surface is found to be damaged, replace the oil pickup tube assembly. Refer to VIBRATION DAMPER, CRANKSHAFT, MAIN BEARINGS, FLYWHEEL AND CRANKCASE
for installation instructions if the oil pickup tube must be replaced.

step1.para: Remove the test gauge and reinstall the oil drain plug at the oil cooler.
Reinstall the oil pan using a new gasket. Refer to VIBRATION DAMPER, CRANKSHAFT, MAIN BEARINGS, FLYWHEEL AND CRANKCASE.
Install the vibration damper as described in VIBRATION DAMPER, CRANKSHAFT, MAIN BEARINGS, FLYWHEEL AND CRANKCASE.

figure.caption: Figure 9.49. Oil Pump Pickup Tube Leak Check Areas.
